data.name: Garlic Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Here is the complete soundtrack of Garlic composed by Darvel, french singer songwriter and OST composer, passionate about japanimation and retrogaming.
This score will take you along despair-dance, horror-funk, electro-paranoid, baby-techno and other absurd styles of music, but always composed with love to make your hard journey a little sweeter... if possible.
There are 72 tracks (total lenght 2.46hrs), grouped in 3CDs.

data.short_description: Here is the complete soundtrack of Garlic composed by Darvel. 72 tracks. MP3 320kbps. Total size : 382mb / 2,46gb. Total lenght : 2.46h.
